TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void Action<in T1,in T2>(T1 arg1, T2 arg2);
.class public auto ansi sealed Action`2<- T1, - T2> extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub Action(Of In T1, In T2)(arg1 As T1, arg2 As T2)
generic <typename T1, typename T2> public delegate void Action(T1 arg1, T2 arg2);
public delegate void Action<T1,T2>(T1 arg1, T2 arg2);
.class public auto ansi sealed Action`2<T1, T2> extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub Action(Of T1, T2)(arg1 As T1, arg2 As T2)

typeparam.name: T1
typeparam.span: 此委托封装的方法的第一个参数的类型。

span.span: The type of the first parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

typeparam.name: T2
typeparam.span: 此委托封装的方法的第二个参数的类型。

span.span: The type of the second parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

param.name: arg1
param.span: 此委托封装的方法的第一个参数。

span.span: The first parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

param.name: arg2
param.span: 此委托封装的方法的第二个参数。

span.span: The second parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

summary.span: 封装一个方法，该方法具有两个参数且不返回值。

span.span: Encapsulates a method that has two parameters and does not return a value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 委托以参数形式传递方法，而无需显式声明自定义委托。You can use the delegate to pass a method as a parameter without explicitly declaring a custom delegate. 封装的方法必须对应于由此委托定义的方法签名。The encapsulated method must correspond to the method signature that is defined by this delegate. 这意味着封装的方法必须具有两个通过值传递给它的参数，并且不能返回值。This means that the encapsulated method must have two parameters that are both passed to it by value, and it must not return a value. （在C#中，该方法必须返回 `void`。(In C#, the method must return `void`. 在 Visual Basic 中，它必须由 `Sub`...`End Sub`In Visual Basic, it must be defined by the `Sub`…`End Sub` construct。construct. 它也可以是返回忽略的值的方法。）通常，这种方法用于执行操作。It can also be a method that returns a value that is ignored.) Typically, such a method is used to perform an operation. > [!NOTE] > 若要引用具有两个参数并返回值的方法，请改用泛型 委托。To reference a method that has two parameters and returns a value, use the generic delegate instead. 使用 委托时，无需显式定义一个委托，该委托封装具有两个参数的方法。When you use the delegate, you do not have to explicitly define a delegate that encapsulates a method with two parameters. 例如，下面的代码显式声明一个名为 `ConcatStrings`的委托。For example, the following code explicitly declares a delegate named `ConcatStrings`. 然后，它将对两个方法之一的引用分配给它的委托实例。It then assigns a reference to either of two methods to its delegate instance. 一个方法将两个字符串写入控制台;第二个字符串将两个字符串写入文件。One method writes two strings to the console; the second writes two strings to a file. [!code-csharp[System.Action~2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Action~2/cs/Delegate.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Action~2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Action~2/vb/Delegate.vb#1)] 下面的示例通过实例化 委托简化了此代码，而不是显式定义一个新委托并为其分配一个命名方法。The following example simplifies this code by instantiating the delegate instead of explicitly defining a new delegate and assigning a named method to it. [!code-csharp[System.Action~2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Action~2/cs/Action2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Action~2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Action~2/vb/action2.vb#2)] 你还可以在中C#使用匿名方法的 委托，如下面的示例所示。You can also use the delegate with anonymous methods in C#, as the following example illustrates. （有关匿名方法的介绍，请参阅[匿名方法](/dotnet/csharp/programming-guide/statements-expressions-operators/anonymous-methods)。）(For an introduction to anonymous methods, see [Anonymous Methods](/dotnet/csharp/programming-guide/statements-expressions-operators/anonymous-methods).) [!code-csharp[System.Action~2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Action~2/cs/Anon.cs#3)] 你还可以将 lambda 表达式分配给 委托实例，如下面的示例所示。You can also assign a lambda expression to an delegate instance, as the following example illustrates. （有关 lambda 表达式的介绍，请参阅[Lambda 表达式](/dotnet/csharp/programming-guide/statements-expressions-operators/lambda-expressions)。）(For an introduction to lambda expressions, see [Lambda Expressions](/dotnet/csharp/programming-guide/statements-expressions-operators/lambda-expressions).) [!code-csharp[System.Action~2#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Action~2/cs/Lambda.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Action~2#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Action~2/vb/lambda.vb#4)]
